```{ojs}
import { Bcve, Ref } from "./BibleBooksCodes_Tables.js";

RefList_ = (ref) => {
  if (Array.isArray(ref)) {
    return ref
  } else
  return [ref]
}
 
ContentList_  = async (lst) => {
    const mir = new Ref(lst);
    await mir.fetch_parallel();   // Wait for data to be fetched
    return mir
  }

ContentData_  = async (lst) => {
    const mir = new Ref(lst);
    await mir.fetch_parallel();   // Wait for data to be fetched
    return await mir.data;
  }

ContentHTML_  = async (lst) => {
    const uniqueResult = [...new Set(lst)];
    const mir = new Ref(uniqueResult);
    await mir.fetch_parallel();   // Wait for data to be fetched
    const midata = await mir.data;
    // Display the list
    const mihtml = html`<ul>${midata.map(item => html`<li style="line-height: 1.4; margin-bottom: 10px; color: amber"><strong>${item.ref}</strong> ${item.content} <em>${item.version}</em></li></div>`)}`
    return mihtml
  }

RefShow_ = async (ref) => {
  const mb = new Bcve(ref);
  
  if (mb.is_valid) {
    const mir = new Ref(mb.param);
    await mir.fetch_parallel();   // Wait for data to be fetched
//    await mir.displayData(); 
//    return mir.outputContent;
    return await mir.data;
  } else {
    return `<div><ul><li>${mb.param}</li></ul></div>`  
  }
}
```
